Articles.Content:
Welcome to S.M.P ( Special Mission Projects )

I'll be using this post to show off and share some of my SMP stuff along with some videos & screens of projects, now you may be wondering what SMP is.

What is S.M.P ? S.M.P means Special Mission Projects that are rocket's & projects that are tests to see if they work, SMP in KPS is easier then the model's i use to make and i'll tell ya they wore hard to fly sometimes.

 

How is got its name?

S.M.P started back in 1998 wend I first built a test rocket back wend I was a model rocketeer I no longer fly model rockets anymore and have moved my rocket ideas into KSP were I restarted the SMP projects ones agen,

 I'm not the bust out there so I'll do my bust to keep it simple please forgive me is I make any errors.

"Jeb  how are we going to enplane to Bill what happened to his truck wend he gets back to Karben?"

I hope you all enjoy this.

I did up a pack of the trucks if anyone wants to try them out.

https://mods.curse.com/shareables/kerbal/251286-smp-turcks

I'll be posting a new test video on a rocket I tweaked abit and you can see how it went... I Overpower it
New Video EP3 "Lost and Found"

SMP biggest thart has come...

Hope you liked the video its not grate its fun doing it.
